pullRequest.title: Throw better exception on wrong `dynamic_templates` syntax

nodes.bodyText: small style nit: can you use ((fieldNode instanceof List) == false) instead? We prefer that kind of more verbose state to the negate operator for better readability throughout the codebase.

I think it would be good to provide some more information the user what went wrong. In this case it would be great to tell the user know that dynamic_templates expects an array of named objects or something along those lines.

commit.message: Fix style and add detail error information
